com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.logger

Class FileLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.logger.FileLogger

  • public class FileLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple file logger that works with SalesforceLogger to write log entries to a file.
    Author:
    bhariharan
